snippet: Aggressive action by Benjamin M. Lawsky, New York’s top banking regulator, against the British bank Standard Chartered has some wondering about his tactics and his ultimate goals.
abstract: Aggressive action by Benjamin M Lawsky, New York’s top banking regulator, against the British bank Standard Chartered has some wondering about his tactics and his ultimate goals; he has drawn both flattering and critical comparisons to his predecessors, including Eliot Spitzer; some officials view his action as the product of political ambition, while others laud Lawsky's aggressiveness.
lead_paragraph: Aggressive action by Benjamin M. Lawsky, New York’s top banking regulator, against the British bank Standard Chartered has some wondering about his tactics and his ultimate goals.
